Given the current state of the game and the position of the avatar (row = 1, col = 2), the position has not changed since the last action, indicating that the avatar might need to rotate before moving. 

At this point, the immediate surroundings of the avatar consist of a wall to the north (up), a passive element (open space) to the east (right), and more open space to the south (down) and west (left). 

Since there's a wall directly above the avatar, moving up (north) is not possible. Moving left (west) will keep the avatar in place without valid interaction, as it would face another wall. 

The next valid action would be to move one space to the right (east) since that is an open space and will also provide more options for further action.

``` Action:2 ```
This action should allow the avatar to progress further into the level and potentially open up more pathways for box manipulation and coin collection.
